compliance_assessment.framework_description: ISO/IEC 27001 is an international standard for information security management systems (ISMS), providing a systematic approach to managing sensitive company information, ensuring its confidentiality, integrity, and availability.

requirements.evidence: User registration process is defined but lacks detailed documentation for de-registration.
gaps: Lack of formal process for user de-registration.
recommendations: Establish a formal user de-registration process.

requirements.evidence: Passwords are hashed automatically using strong algorithms.
Lack of comprehensive documentation for security controls and procedures.
recommendations: Develop and maintain comprehensive documentation for all security controls and procedures.

requirements.evidence: Some responsibilities are defined, but monitoring and logging procedures are not fully established.
gaps: Lack of established monitoring and logging procedures.
recommendations: Implement monitoring and logging procedures to detect and respond to security incidents.

critical_gaps: Lack of formal user de-registration process.
remediation_plan: Establish a formal user de-registration process.
Develop comprehensive documentation for all security controls and procedures.
